Name: Select elements with XPath
Description: Can I select one or more elements using XPath expression?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes: `$x(path [, startNode])` returns an array of DOM elements that match the given XPath expression. It has an optional second parameter, `startNode`, that specifies an element or Node from which to search for elements.
Chrome.Name: Select elements with xpath

Firefox.Notes: 1. `$x(path [, startNode])` returns an array of DOM elements that match the given XPath expression. It has an optional second parameter, `startNode`, that specifies an element or Node from which to search for elements.
Firefox.Name: Select elements with xpath
